triples.name: Reinforcement learning
triples.relevance: The core machine learning paradigm that Decision Transformer reimagines as a sequence modeling problem.

triples.name: Transformer (deep learning)
triples.relevance: The foundational neural network architecture that Decision Transformer leverages for its RL application.

triples.name: Generative pre-trained transformer
triples.relevance: GPT models demonstrate the scalability of transformer-based language modeling that inspires Decision Transformer's approach.

triples.name: BERT (language model)
triples.relevance: BERT exemplifies advances in language modeling with transformer-based pre-training that Decision Transformer builds upon.

triples.name: Policy gradient method
triples.relevance: Traditional policy gradient methods represent the prior RL approach that Decision Transformer moves away from.

triples.name: Autoregressive model
triples.relevance: The autoregressive modeling principle is the core of Decision Transformer's causally masked sequence generation.

triples.name: Atari
triples.relevance: Atari games are a standard benchmark for evaluating RL algorithms that Decision Transformer is tested on.

triples.name: Attention (machine learning)
triples.relevance: Attention mechanisms are the key architectural component that enables the Transformer model used in Decision Transformer.

triples.name: Seq2seq
triples.relevance: Sequence-to-sequence modeling principles are foundational to Decision Transformer's casting of RL as sequence modeling.

triples.name: Offline learning
triples.relevance: Decision Transformer proposes a novel transformer-based approach to offline reinforcement learning that outperforms prior methods.
